definition: erhua variant of 快點|快点[kuai4 dian3]

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items
variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc

sentences.english: Could you please drive faster? I'm in a hurry.
sentences.chinese: 您能开快点儿吗？我赶时间。

sentences.english: We're starving, and would you mind hurrying?
sentences.chinese: 我们都要饿死了，能快点儿吗？

sentences.english: Would you please let the fluid drop more quickly?
sentences.chinese: 请您把液体滴速调快点儿好吗？

sentences.english: We are starving. Would you please hurry up?
sentences.chinese: 我们都要饿死了，能快点儿吗？

sentences.english: Hurry up, quickly, teach me more.
I really hope that winter will come soon. Then it won't be so hot.
sentences.chinese: 我真希望冬天快点儿来，这样就不会这么热了。

sentences.english: "Take the allegretto a little faster, " says Mr.
sentences.chinese: 把小快板再谈得快点儿。

sentences.english: Hurry up, or you will miss the last bus.
sentences.chinese: 快点儿，否则你将误了最后一班车了。

sentences.english: Shake it up, we'll be late.
Get up quickly or you will miss the early bus.
sentences.chinese: 快点儿起床，否则你就会错过早班车了。

sentences.english: If we are to be there on time, we'll have to hurry up.
sentences.chinese: 如果想准时赶到那里，我们必须快点儿。

sentences.english: Be quick, or you will miss the early bus.
sentences.chinese: 快点儿，否则你要错过早班车了。

sentences.english: Don't take a deep breath. Please tell me immediately what happened.
sentences.chinese: 别大喘气，快点儿告诉我那里发生了什么事。

sentences.english: Hurry up, or we'll be late.
sentences.chinese: 快点儿，否则我们会迟到的。

sentences.english: We have to time. You had better hurry up.
sentences.chinese: 我们没时间，你最好快点儿。

definition: to do sth more quickly/Hurry up!/Get a move on!
erhua variant of 等一會|等一会[deng3 yi1 hui4]
in a moment/later/also pr. [dai1 hui3 r5] or [dai1 hui5 r5]
erhua variant of 寶貝|宝贝[bao3 bei4]
interjection of wonder, shock or admiration
in your dreams!/as if!/You wish!/I wish that were so
to run fast/to sprint/to gallop/Gee up!/Run for it!
